value.name: Lord of Eroded Primal Fire
value.desc:
A fell dragon, congealed from the power of pitch-black darkness.

A monster of the void, known as both the Reaper of the Abyss and "Gosoythoth." It is able to corrupt memories contained within the ley lines of the earth, congealing them into tangible forces of catastrophic portent. From these memories that since time immemorial have flowed below the land, it has managed to extract the remnant will of a primordial elemental dragon sovereign, drawing it out like marrow to repurpose as the foundation of its own fabricated image.

But is it truly a mere "image"? Brought back by the very otherworldly forces it had once resisted, a once-dead dragon opens its eyes anew, forsaking all in this brief dream of a resurrection. Trapped perpetually in the final day of its existence by this pitch-black gospel, its boundless fury has consumed all reason. Now, what remains is its unrelenting lust for battle, burning on without end.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deal 3</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>and</color> <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> <color=#ffffffa6>the top 1 card from your deck.</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 1</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, and deals 1</color> <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to all the opponent's off-field characters. Both sides</color> <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> <color=#ffffffa6>the top 3 cards from their decks and attach 1 stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Resentment</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to themselves.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Resentment</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Each stack causes the character to which this is attached to deal +1 DMG and +1 Elemental Burst</color> <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (Can stack, no stacking limit)</color>

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>(Passive) For every 6 cards you</color> <color=#ffffff>Discard</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, attach 1 stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Resentment</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to self.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Resentment</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Each stack causes the character to which this is attached to deal +1 DMG and +1 Elemental Burst</color> <color=#ffffff>Piercing DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. (Can stack, no stacking limit)</color>

Applies Pyro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Vaporize</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Overloaded</color> : DMG +2 for this instance, the target is forcibly switched to the next character
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> + <color=#99ff88>Dendro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Burning</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [ <color=#ffffff>Burning Flame</color> ] that will deal 1 Pyro DMG at the end of the Round (Takes effect once, max 2 stacks)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Discard</color>
Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.
<color=#ece5d8>Piercing DMG</color>
Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
